traceability.evidence: • CLI flag parsing in src/cli-options-helpers.js and src/cli-options.js uses parseMinAgeFlag with integer bounds 1–365, exiting with code 2 on invalid or missing values (covered by test/cli.flags.test.js). • Default min-age=7 behavior: test/cli.flags.test.js verifies JSON output shows prod/dev minAge = 7 when no --min-age provided. • Override via --min-age: test/cli.flags.test.js confirms JSON output shows thresholds.prod.minAge and thresholds.dev.minAge equal to the provided value. • Config file support: src/config-loader.js reads .dry-aged-deps.json:minAge, validates 1–365, merges in parseOptions (precedence CLI > config > default); test/cli.config-file.test.js covers reading minAge from config, invalid JSON, unknown keys, out‐of‐range values, custom config filename. • Help documentation: bin/dry-aged-deps.js printHelp includes --min-age description. • Output includes threshold info: JSON/XML output schemas include or summary.thresholds.prod.minAge/dev.minAge (covered by xml-formatter.thresholds tests and JSON formatter tests).
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for Configurable Age Threshold (005.0) are satisfied. CLI flag and config-file loading are implemented, validated, and tested; defaults and overrides behave correctly; help text is present; output includes threshold information.
